    Method
    Description
    void
    Lobby.closeLobby(ClientConnection connectionWhoMadeTheLobbyClose)
    Close the lobby if a player disconnects.
    void
    Server.deregisterConnection(ClientConnection c)
    Given a client connection, if it isn't already part of a lobby, then it simply gets removed from the waiting connections (a list of all those connections which are not already part of a lobby).
    void
    Server.handleLobbyState(Lobby lobbyToHandle, ClientConnection connectionToMove)
    Manage a given lobby: if the number of players in the lobby is acceptable (the lobby is full), the game starts.
    Remove the connection which joined the lobby from the server 'waiting connections' list.
    void
    Server.newWaitingConnection(ClientConnection connection)
    Adds a brand new connection to the waiting connections.
    void
